definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: It is involved in the sunthesis and breakdown of the amino acid threonine.
sentences.chinese: 它包括合成和分解氨基酸蘇氨酸。

sentences.english: Threonine grafted compound could adsorb cuprum, iron and calcium.
sentences.chinese: 接枝蘇氨酸化合物可以吸附銅鐵鈣三種金屬離子。
